title: Outside the Art Show
logline: Jason leaves the chaotic reception frustrated and determined to contact the artist who warned him about a possible scam.

setting.environment: Nighttime street outside the gallery; quiet compared to the chaos inside; Jason’s truck parked nearby.

JASON_TOWNE.objective: Escape the art show and contact the New York artist about the alleged scam.

STACEY.objective: Support Jason and follow the unfolding story.

story_beats.description: Jason walks out of the reception, clearly overwhelmed and upset.
Stacey checks in, trying to understand Jason's emotional state.
Jason vents about the stunt and expresses his disgust with the spectacle.
Jason resolves to call the artist Mary mentioned to understand the scam.
Jason fights with his dying key fob again, mirroring earlier scenes.
Jason and Stacey leave to head back to the studio.

dialogue.line: Frustrated? Yes. I don’t want attention on my art because it’s part of a stunt. It’s super fuckin lame.
I’m going back to my studio to call this other artist who got scammed.
Dammit! Why do I keep forgetting to replace this fuckin battery?

setup_payoffs.Mary’s warning: Sets up Jason’s call to the scammed artist.
